title: Margaret Thatcher 'lied to the House of Commons' over the Westland affair
text: Long-held suspicions that Margaret Thatcher lied to the House of Commons over the Westland helicopter affair in 1986 have been endorsed by her official biographer, Charles Moore . Asked if Mrs Thatcher had deliberately misled Parliament over
